name: A Challenge Awaits…
description:
Your current character has not yet completed this mission on Legendary difficulty.
Completing all Legendary missions provides additional rewards per class.

name: Legendary
description: Heavily shielded and highly aggressive combatants appear in great numbers.

name: Oscillation
description:
Dealing damage with Scout Rifles, Pulse Rifles, and Grenade Launchers gradually reduces their damage while increasing the damage of Submachine Guns and Shotguns, and vice versa. 

Other weapon types deal significantly less damage.

name: Champion Foes
description: You will face [Disruption] Overload and [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

name: Heavy Ammo Rules (Alpha)
description: Spawn Cadence: Heavy ammo will spawn every round after a long duration.

name: Weekly Boss
description: This week, a Subjugator Omen awaits you on wave 50.

name: Air Superiority
description: Flying units do increased damage.

name: Rank-and-File Damage Increase
description: Rank-and-file combatants deal increased damage.

description:
Extinguish
Extra Champions
Locked Loadout
Extra Shields

description: You may face combatants with [Arc] Arc, [Solar] Solar, or [Void] Void shields.

description: {var:1027206613}% bonus to Rocket Launcher damage.

name: Matchmaking
description: Matchmaking selects players based on character class. Each team is formed entirely of one class type.

name: Hot Knife
description: Shanks now have Solar shields

name: Crossfire Challenge
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Ashes to Ashes
description: Dealing damage with a Solar weapon now applies scorch to your targets, but your foes also now apply scorch to you when they deal Solar or explosive damage.

name: Empath
description: Enhanced radar. Take increased damage from melee.

name: Arc Threat
description: {var:4005007457}% increase to incoming Arc damage.

description: A challenge awaits…

description: Combatant difficulty increases after each preparation phase.

name: Champion Foes

description: A challenge awaits…

description: Limited fireteam revives. Gain additional revives by defeating Champions.

name: Overcharged Scout Rifle
description: {var:1027206613}% bonus to Scout Rifle damage.

name: Which Witch
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Rune Rules
description:
Receiving Rune Progress while not holding a Rune will provide one.  Further progress will charge the Rune, eventually upgrading it to higher tiers.

Consume your Rune to acquire Court Armaments.  Using a Tier 3 Rune for a Tier 1 purchase will still consume the Rune.  Plan your acquisitions with care!

Available Court Armaments rotate each day.  Look for combos that will help you complete encounters faster!

name: Escalating Difficulty
description: With each encounter completed, combatants will grow more powerful and aggressive.

name: Grounded
description: Damage taken while you are airborne is greatly increased.

name: The Only Oracle For You
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Matchmaking
description: Matchmaking selects players based on character class. Each team has one of each class.

name: Glass
description: Health and shields are reduced by half, but recovery is twice as fast.

name: Shocker
description: When defeated, Goblins spawn Arc pools that causes damage over time.

name: Data Buffs
description:
Potential Data buffs:
• Chance to create Threadlings on Strand damage
• Chance to apply Suppressed on Void damage
• Chance to gain grenade energy on combatant final blows

name: Focused Activity
description: This activity is currently Focused. Your score will contribute to your class's standing in the fight for glory in the Focus Activity Event.

name: Iron Banner: Eruption
description:
To win, rack up points by defeating your opponents. You gain more points and a boost of energy at each final blow while on a streak of 2 or more.

Streak: The number of opponents you defeat in a single life. Streaks are broken into 2 tiers called Surging and Primed that award you increasingly more points and energy at each final blow. But beware: once you become Primed, you need to keep quickly defeating your opponents or you'll erupt!

The Hunt: This activates for your team when you or your teammate is Primed by reaching a streak of 5 or more. At the start of The Hunt, the whole team gets a boost of energy.  It ends when your team has no more players Primed.

name: Contestants: The Way of the Hoof
description:
Round 1: Hive
Round 2: Fallen
Final Round: Valus Ta'aurc

All abilities are disabled! Weapons are your only defense.

Collect Special ammo and Heavy ammo from crates around the map.

name: Onslaught Rules
description:
Defend and repair the ADU against waves of combatants. If the ADU is destroyed, the activity will end.

Scraps: Activity currency used to purchase and upgrade defenses at the start of every set and after waves 3 and 6.

Rewards: Received after defeating the boss wave.

Bonus Objectives: These reward resources and armaments.

name: Survival Rules
description:
To win, your team must become the last Guardian(s) standing by defeating the opposing team to exhaust their revives.

Revives: Both teams are allocated a limited pool of revives. If a team runs out of their revives, they can no longer respawn.

name: Contest Mode
description: The activity is at a fixed difficulty. Test your might.

name: Scorched Earth
description: Enemies throw grenades significantly more often.

name: Heavy Ammo Rules (Bravo)
description: Spawn Cadence: Heavy ammo will spawn on the third round only.

name: Shielded Foes
description: [Void] Void Shields

name: Competitive Division Rules
description:
This playlist contains Collision and Survival. When you launch, it will randomly select one of the modes for you to play.

Collision: To win, score more points than your opponents by capturing and controlling the zone. There will be one zone active at a time. Defeating your opponents does not directly grant points.

Survival: To win, your team must become the last Guardian(s) standing by defeating the opposing team to exhaust their revives.

description: All Vanguard Rank point gains are increased!

name: Stasis Burn
description: +50% Stasis effectiveness.

name: Dynamic Difficulty
description:
Additional modifiers are randomly selected at the start of each encounter.

Combatant power increases after each lap.

name: Haste
description: Moving quickly slowly regenerates your health. Standing still slowly deals damage.

name: Activity Rules
description:
Defeat as many bosses as possible before the countdown timer runs out.

The countdown timer pauses during preparation phases.

name: Flare
description: When close to a fireteam member, gain increased Recovery and Super regeneration.

name: New Territory
description:
This playlist features three new Crucible maps: Dissonance, Eventide Labs, and Cirrus Plaza.

It features four randomized modes: Collision, Clash, Survival, and Elimination.

name: Overcharged Bow
description: {var:1027206613}% bonus to Bow damage.

name: Escalating Difficulty
description: Combatant difficulty increases after every other preparation phase.

name: Galvanized
description: Combatants have more health and are more difficult to stun.

name: Famine
description: All ammunition drops are significantly reduced.

name: Epitaph
description: Taken combatants generate blight geysers when defeated.

name: Firebound
description: When close to a fireteam member, gain increased Recovery and Super regeneration.

name: Contest Mode
description: The activity is set at a fixed difficulty. Test your might.

name: Enigma Protocol Rules
description:
Venture into the VexNet, disrupt the Vex from accessing and locking away a treasure trove of Golden Age data, and investigate strange clues left in the network.

Enigma Protocol uses a low starting timer, requiring Guardians to move quickly and find ways to increase their time in the VexNet.

To increase your timer:
-Destroy Network Security Nodes
-Defeat Archival Timekeepers
-Unlock "Codebase Splice" Vendor Upgrades

name: Hot Step
description: When defeated, challenging combatants drop fire at their location.

name: Onslaught Rules
description:
Defend and repair the ADU against waves of combatants. There are 10 waves to a set.

ADU: If the ADU is destroyed, the activity ends with the set.

Scraps: In-activity currency earned by scoring. Used to purchase and upgrade defenses at the start of every set and after the third and sixth waves.

Rewards: Granted on defeating a set's boss wave. Subsequent sets grant better rewards. Expert difficulty increases rewards.

Bonus Objectives: Reward resources, vendor reputation, and armaments.

description: Your Power is significantly below the recommended level for this activity.

All weapons are disabled! Abilities are your only defense.

name: Equipment Locked
description: You will not be able to change your equipment after this activity starts.

name: Strength of Memory
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Shot Caller
description: Landing multiple precision hits with a Primary ammo weapon empowers Special and Heavy ammo weapons. Reduces incoming damage while active.

name: Placement Series
description:
Complete placement matches to determine your starting position on the current Season's Ranked ladder.

Matches played: {var:4027254163} of {var:2701182729}

name: Collision Rules
description:
Capture and control active zones to score points. There are multiple zone locations, but only one active at a time. 

The team with the most points at the end of the match wins! Defeating your opponents does not grant points. 

Zones: Score +1 point when your team captures an active zone. Score +1 point for each time interval your team controls that zone. Captured zones will deactivate after a set amount of time and a new zone will activate elsewhere on the map.

name: Denial
description: Taken Vandals summon their shields significantly more often.

name: Escalating Difficulty
description: Power is disabled in this activity. Combatant difficulty increases with each set.

name: Balanced Diet Challenge
description: "Salvation's Edge" raid challenge modes.

name: Shielded Foes
description:
You will face combatants with [Solar] Solar shields.

Activity modifiers may add more shield types.

name: Martyr
description: Exploder units have more health.

name: Contest of Elders Rules
description:
Successfully complete four laps in the Contest of Elders.

Warden's Judgment:  A dynamic range of values tied to the activity's difficulty. Stacks of positive Judgment are called Warden's Favor and increase encounter difficulty. Stacks of negative Judgment are called Warden's Punishment and slightly decrease difficulty. 

Warden's Sentencing: Following every reward phase, the Warden will assess the fireteam's Judgment rating. Warden's Favor allows the fireteam to skip an encounter, while Warden's Punishment activates the Punishment Protocol.

Secondary Objectives: Challenges and critical objectives appear in every encounter. Mastery of these objectives contributes toward Warden's Judgment.

Rewards: Granted upon the defeat of a boss. Subsequent laps pay out better rewards. Stacks of Warden's Favor increase your rewards even further.

name: Ensemble's Refrain
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Chill Touch
description: Being hit by a melee attack slows you.

name: Solar Thermal Swap
description: Solar final blows grant melee and grenade energy. Stasis subclasses receive a lot; other subclasses receive a little.

name: Matchmaking
description:
When on an active Lighthouse Passage, matchmaking does not utilize skill.

When on a Trials Passage or a completed Lighthouse Passage, matchmaking prefers players with similar weekly performance in Trials of Osiris.

name: Solar Singe
description: Solar damage increases slightly from all sources.

name: Boss Rotation
description: A Siegehook Ogre awaits you on wave 50.

name: Countdown Rules
description:
To win, your team must detonate or defuse charges. Defeating the entire opposing team and being the last Guardian(s) standing will also grant victory.

Attackers: Arm the charge at one of two sites, and guard it until it detonates. Eliminating the defending team will result in winning a round.

Defenders (Arming Phase): Prevent the attacking team from arming any charges until the round ends. Eliminating the attacking team will result in winning a round. 

Defenders (Defusing Phase): Defuse the armed charge. Eliminating the attacking team will not end the round.

name: Limited Revives
description: Limited fireteam revives. The Warden will grant additional revive tokens for each Model Prisoner defeated.

name: Control Rules
description:
Capture the zones and defeat your opponents for points. The team with the most points wins.

Zone Advantage: The state when your team owns 2 zones. Your team gains +2 points for every Guardian you defeat while in this state.

Power Play: The state when your team owns all 3 zones. Your team gains +3 points for every Guardian you defeat while in this state.

Capture Participant: You gain an additional +1 point for each player that participated in the zone capture.

name: On the Clock
description: This activity is timed. If your fireteam fails to complete the activity in the allotted time, everyone is returned to orbit.

name: Raid Challenges
description: All challenges are active.

name: Momentum Control Rules
description:
Capture the zones and defeat your opponents for points. The team with the most points wins. This is a faster version of Control.

Momentum: You can capture zones faster. Weapon damage is significantly increased. Abilities and Supers regenerate when you defeat an opponent. Passive regeneration is significantly decreased. 

Zone Advantage: The state when your team owns 2 zones. Your team gains +2 points for every Guardian you defeat while in this state.

Power Play: The state when your team owns all 3 zones. Your team gains +3 points for every Guardian you defeat while in this state.

name: Contest Mode
description: The activity is at a fixed difficulty. Test your might.

name: Frontliner
description: Ability recharge rate is increased.

name: Arena: Breach Executable: Mode Rules
description:
Complete objectives and defeat high-value targets to generate data Motes.

Upon death, some collected data will drop to the ground to be reacquired.

Pick up data and deposit it to earn power-ups during encounters.

Successfully completing encounters in Expert difficulty will provide additional rewards at the end of the activity.

name: Gambit Rules
description:
To win, be the first team to summon and defeat your Primeval. 

Motes: Defeated foes will drop Motes you can pick up. Watch out! If you die, you'll lose any Motes you're holding. 

Bank: Deposit Motes you're holding in the bank. Bank enough Motes, and you'll summon a Primeval. 

Blockers: Bank enough Motes at once to summon Blockers that lock the opposing team's bank. 

Invasions: As your team banks Motes, an invasion portal will open, allowing you to enter the opposing team's area. Take them out to make them drop their Motes!

name: Mettle
description:

name: Under Construction
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Countdown Rules
description:
To win, your team must detonate or defuse both charges.

Attackers: Arm the charge at one of two sites and guard it until it detonates. 

Defenders (Arming Phase): Prevent the attacking team from arming any charges until the round ends.  

Defenders (Defusing Phase): Defuse the armed charge.

Respawns Enabled: Defeated Guardians will respawn after a short time.

name: Overcharged Pulse Rifle
description: {var:1027206613}% bonus to Pulse Rifle damage.

name: Arach-NO!
description: When defeated, Fallen Vandals spawn a web mine at their feet.

name: Shaxx's Training Weights
description: Ability Cooldowns Increased

name: Subclass Locked
description: You will not be able to change your equipped subclass during this activity.

name: Nether Rules
description: Health Recovery is disabled, and you have significantly greater health and overshields. Healing Orbs can be occasionally found throughout the activity.

name: Exotic Drop Rate Boosts Gained
description: Initial Exotic drop rate boosts: {var:3177264920}

name: Chaff
description: Radar is disabled.

name: Escalating Difficulty
description: Power is disabled in this activity. Combatant difficulty increases with each set.

name: Raid Challenges
description: All challenges are active.

name: Shielded Foes
description: [Arc] Arc and [Solar] Solar Shields

name: Overcharged Shotgun
description: {var:1027206613}% bonus to Shotgun damage.

name: Wait For It…
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Shielded Foes
description:
You will face combatants with [Arc] Arc shields.

Activity modifiers may add more shield types.

name: Shielded Foes
description: [Arc] Arc Shields

name: Bonfire Bash Rules
description:
Stoke the bonfire!

Ignition Carriers: Glowing combatants that drop Igniters when dealt final blows.

Igniters: Objects that can be picked up and thrown into the bonfire to stoke the flames.

Bonfire: Stoke the bonfire with Igniters to make the flames grow.

Taken Interference: Taken will disrupt the bonfire throughout the activity. Defeat them to reignite the bonfire!

name: Quickplay 6v6 Rules
description:
This playlist contains Control and Clash. When you launch, it will randomly select one of the modes for you to play.

Control: Capture the zones and defeat your opponents for points. The more zones you control, the more points you get for each opponent defeated. The team with the most points wins!

Clash: To win, defeat your opponents to score more points than them!

name: Contest Mode Rules
description:
• Combatants have higher aggression and shields.
• Encounters feature resurrection tokens.
• Encounters will enrage.

name: Void Surge
description: {var:2189146210}% bonus to outgoing Void damage.

name: Matchmaking
description: Matchmaking does not utilize skill.

name: Lockdown Rules
description: To win the round, reach the scoring threshold by capture zones, or capture all zones completely.

name: Strangers in Time
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Longer Respawns
description: Increased respawn times.

name: Increased Gambit Rank
description: All Gambit Rank point gains are increased!

name: Shielded Foes
description:
You will face combatants with [Arc] Arc and [Solar] Solar shields.

Activity modifiers may add more shield types.

name: Advanced Modifiers
description: Extra Shields

name: Elimination Rules
description:
To win, your team must become the last Guardian(s) standing by defeating the entire opposing team.

Tiebreaker: A capture zone appears when a round reaches overtime. Win the round by capturing the zone before the other team.

name: Contest Mode Rules
description:
• Enemies have higher aggression and shields.
• Encounters feature resurrection tokens.
• Encounters will enrage.

name: Boosts Gained
description: Initial Exotic drop rate boosts: {var:2223847550}

name: Mettle
description:
The activity is at a fixed difficulty.

Your effective Power is capped at {var:1311088063}.

name: Supremacy Rules
description: Defeated Guardians drop a crest. Secure opposing crests to score points. Secure allied crests to deny your opponents points.

name: Raid Challenges
description: All challenges are active.

name: Champion Foes
description:
You will face [Disruption] Overload and [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

Visit the Character or Mod Customization screen to view your active anti-Champion perks.

name: Escalating Difficulty
description: Combatant power increases after each set.

name: Overcharged Linear Fusion Rifle
description: {var:1027206613}% bonus to Linear Fusion Rifle damage.

name: Attrition
description: Regeneration is greatly impaired. Defeating enemies may create wells of Light.

name: Copies of Copies
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Showdown Rules
description: Win the match by winning more rounds than your opponents. Defeat them to score points; the team with the most points wins a round.

name: Trickle
description: Abilities recharge at a reduced rate.

name: Multiplicity
description: Greater fireteam size scales combatant difficulty and adds limitations on revives.

name: Data Buffs
description:
Potential Data buffs:
• Chance to spawn an Orb of Power on combatant final blows
• Chance to Jolt on Arc Damage
• Chance to gain melee energy on combatant final blows

name: Martyr
description: Exploding units have more health.

name: Overcharged Auto Rifle
description: {var:1027206613}% bonus to Auto Rifle damage.

name: Base Information
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Respawns Enabled
description: Defeated Guardians will respawn after a short time.

name: Iron Banner: Tribute
description:
To win, defeat your opponents, collect their crests, and deposit them at Cabal beacons.

Cabal Beacons: Beacons appear at various locations on the map, two at a time. They have limited duration before they switch to another position. Collect crests and deposit them at beacons for points.

The Hunt: Activates when the score threshold is met. This is a limited, special state when Caiatl sends a high-value beacon protected with turrets. The high-value beacon awards a bonus score for each crest deposited.

name: Champion Foes
description: You will face [Disruption] Overload Champions.

name: Team Scorched Rules
description:
To win, defeat your opponents to score more points than them! Every player is equipped with a Scorch Cannon.

Scorch Cannon: A heavy-impact weapon borrowed from the Eliksni. Shots can detonate on impact or can be charged by holding and releasing the actuator for a larger explosion.

name: Special Ammo Rules (Alpha)
description: Players do not respawn with Special ammo.

name: Data Buffs
description:
Depositing data will award one of the following buffs:
• Chance to create Threadlings on Strand damage
• Chance to apply Suppressed on Void damage
• Chance to gain grenade energy on combatant final blows

name: Solar Threat
description: {var:4005007457}% increase to incoming Solar damage.

name: Zone Control Rules
description:
To win, score more points than your opponent by capturing and controlling zones.

Zones: Score points for each zone your team controls.

name: Shielded Foes
description:
You will face combatants with [Void] Void shields.

Activity modifiers may add more shield types.

name: Raider Shield
description: Scorn Raiders now have Void shields.

name: The Grass Is Always Greener
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Double Crucible Drops
description: All Crucible loot drops are doubled on wins.

name: Contest Mode
description: The activity is at a fixed difficulty. Test your might.

name: Data Buffs
description:
Potential Data buffs:
• Spawn an ammo crate
• Chance to spawn Threadlings on combatant final blows
• Chance to gain grenade energy on combatant final blows

name: Scenic Route Challenge
description: "Salvation's Edge" raid challenge modes.

name: Master Modifiers
description:
Extra Champions
Locked Loadout
Extra Shields

name: Togetherness
description: Base health regen is reduced. If near another player, health regen is increased.

name: Forever Fight
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Void Threat
description: {var:4005007457}% increase to incoming Void damage.

name: Iron Banner: Fortress
description:
To win, score more points that your opponent by capturing and defending the zones. The Hunt activates twice per match.

Zones: Gain 2 points for each zone your team controls at each time interval.

Zone Advantage: The state when your team controls 2 zones. Your team gains 4 points at each time interval.

Power Play: The state when your team controls all 3 zones. Your team gains 6 points at each time interval.

The Hunt: Occurs twice per match. Caiatl sends a high-value zone via Drop Pod. This zone is quick to capture and awards a large number of points over a shorter period of time.

name: Exotic Modifiers
description: Power Level: All combatants in this activity will be at least {var:3112783658} points over your current Power level.

name: Boosts Gained
description: Initial Exotic drop rate boosts: {var:3104627285}

name: Overcharged Grenade Launcher
description: {var:1027206613}% bonus to damage for all Grenade Launchers.

name: Daodan Surge
description: Melee abilities deal more damage and recharge much faster.

name: Notswap
description: Swapping Exotic armor or ammo type in the Kinetic or Energy weapon slot drains all ability energy.

name: Durandal's Edge
description: When you're holding a Sword, damage from nearby combatants is reduced.

name: Stasis Surge
description: {var:2189146210}% bonus to outgoing Stasis damage.

name: Strand Surge
description: {var:2189146210}% bonus to outgoing Strand damage.

name: Increased Crucible Rank
description: All Crucible Rank point gains are increased!

name: Slow Capturing Zones
description: Zones capture slower, and capturing a zone immediately scores. Reduced score limits are in place for the slow capturing variant.

name: Expert Modifiers
description: Opponent Shields Disabled

name: Contestants: Disciples of the Neigh
description:
Round 1: Hive
Round 2: Vex
Final Round: Valus Ta'aurc

name: Boosts Gained
description: Initial Exotic drop rate boosts: {var:733308108}

name: Randomized Banes
description: Combatants are granted random Banes.

name: Subclass Requirements
description: A fireteam member needs to be equipped with a Light subclass. The other fireteam member needs to be equipped with a Darkness subclass. The Prismatic subclass fulfills either requirement.

name: Shielded Foes
description:
You will face combatants with [Solar] Solar and [Void] Void shields.

Activity modifiers may add more shield types.

name: Special Augmentation Rules
description:
Combatants may have unique qualities indicated by a flashing effect applied to them.

These include some Augmentations which reduce incoming damage to bosses but are NOT full immunity shields.  Decide whether to try to deal damage through them, or complete the Augment objective to remove the damage reduction.

name: Relegation Series
description:
Win 2 of the next 3 matches to avoid relegation.

Match results (W-L): {var:1550688411}-{var:3875673079}

name: Red Rover
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Champion Foes
description: You will face [Shield-Piercing] Barrier, [Disruption] Overload, and [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

name: Cooperative Focus Campaign
description: Heavily shielded and highly aggressive combatants appear more frequently and in greater numbers.

name: Mettle
description:
The activity is at a fixed difficulty.

Your effective Power is capped at {var:1311088063}.

name: Challenge Mode
description: All Encounter Challenges Enabled and Required

name: Shielded Foes
description: Combatants may vary each time you play this activity. You may face combatants with [Arc] Arc, [Solar] Solar, or [Void] Void shields.

name: Zero to One Hundred
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Boosts Gained
description: Initial Exotic drop rate boosts: {var:3027371367}

name: Master Modifiers
description:
Extra Champions
Extra Shields

name: Exotic Drop Rate Boosts Gained
description: Initial exotic drop rate boosts: {var:1611655700}

name: Doubles Rules
description:
When you and your ally are reunited, your weapon handling and reload speed are greatly increased, and you gain increased flinch resistance.

When you and your ally are drifting apart, your sprint and slide abilities are enhanced.

name: Weekly Boss
description: This week, an Elder Revenant awaits you on wave 50.

name: Mission Is Timed
description: When the timer reaches zero, the fireteam will be returned to orbit.

name: Forced Reboot Timer
description: If the timer reaches 0:00, the activity will restart.

name: Hands Off
description: A challenge awaits…

name: Arc Singe
description: Arc damage increases slightly from all sources.

name: Champion Foes
description:
You will face [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

Visit the Character or Mod Customization screen to view your active anti-Champion perks.

name: Rift Rules
description:
To win, score more points than your opponent by collecting the Spark and igniting your opponent's Rift.

Spark: Spawns in the center of the map at the beginning of the match and after a team scores. Drops at the Spark Runner's location upon death. 

Rift: Each team has a Rift on their side of the map. Carry the Spark into your opponent's Rift to score. Defend your Rift from opposing Spark Runners.

name: Overcharged Weapons
description:
Weapon overcharges from the Seasonal Artifact are active in this activity.

Kinetic weapons do increased damage when your Super element matches an active surge.

name: Pestilence
description: When defeated, Psions spawn Void grenades at their feet.

name: Boosts Gained
description: Initial Exotic drop rate boosts: {var:2864503325}

name: Limited Revives
description: Limited fireteam revives. Gain additional revives by defeating Champions.

name: Relic Rules
description:
Score points by defeating your opponents with a relic.

Relics: Mysterious weapons that hold immense power. Defeat your opponents with a relic to score points for your team.

Relic Depot: Each depot can equip you with one of the following relics: Aegis Shield, Synaptic Spear, Solar Scythe.

Relic Energy: Players without an equipped relic must earn energy to gain access to the Relic Depot. Relic energy can be built up by your own actions, your team's actions, and even the opponent's actions throughout the match.

name: Dominion Rules
description:
To win, your team must become the last Guardian(s) standing by defeating the entire opposing team or capturing the zone.

Dominion: A capture zone appears at the start of each round. Win the round by capturing the zone.

Elimination: Wins can also be achieved by defeating the opposing team.

Revives: Teammate revives are enabled.

name: Extinguish
description: If your fireteam falls in a Restricted Zone, everyone is returned to orbit.

name: Data Buffs
description:
Depositing data will award one of the following buffs:
• Chance to spawn an Orb of Power on combatant final blows
• Chance to Jolt on Arc Damage
• Chance to gain melee energy on combatant final blows

name: Kell's Vengeance Rules
description:
Complete a perfect lap of the Warden's twisted game.

Warden's Punishment: Failing to successfully complete secondary objectives will result in the Warden inflicting its punishment on the entire fireteam.
